name: Front-End-Capstone
description: Set up of repo - webpack - npm init -y - add build and start scripts to package json - npm install dependencies   - axios   - react, react-dom   - nodemon   - path   - express   - webpack, webpack-cli   - babel-loader, @babel/preset-react, @babel/preset-env, @babel/core     - (npm install -D babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react webpack webpack-cli react react-dom --save)   - style- components     - (npm install --save styled-components)   - maybe mongo, mongoose, morgan - make webpack.config.js file   - module.exports with input, output(path, filename), module with rules, mode, resolve
